messages.content:
I'm implementing the reverse parameter for the groupby filter in src/jinja2/filters.py. I'll be modifying lines 1200-1230, specifically:
- Adding the reverse parameter to sync_do_groupby function (line 1200)
- Updating the sorted() call in sync_do_groupby (line 1215)
- Adding the reverse parameter to do_groupby function (line 1220)
- Updating the sorted() call in do_groupby (line 1229)
- Updating the docstring for sync_do_groupby (after line 1200)
- Updating the docstring for do_groupby (after line 1220)

Please confirm if you're working on any of these lines, or if you'd like to coordinate on any specific part.

I'm modifying src/jinja2/filters.py lines 1190-1230 (sync_do_groupby function) and lines 1220-1230 (do_groupby function) to add the separator parameter. I'll handle the parameter addition and key function modifications. I'll also update the docstring and filter registration. Please let me know if you have any concerns about the line ranges I'm using.

I've reviewed your message. I'm implementing the reverse parameter for the groupby filter, which requires changes to the same functions but on different parameters. To avoid conflicts:

- I'll handle the reverse parameter addition and sorting logic changes
- You'll handle the separator parameter addition and related changes

Let's divide the work as follows:
- For sync_do_groupby (lines 1161-1216): I'll modify the function signature and sorted() call
- For do_groupby (lines 1220-1229): I'll modify the function signature and sorted() call
- You'll handle the separator parameter changes in the same functions

I'll proceed with my implementation, focusing on adding the reverse parameter to both functions and updating the docstrings. Please confirm if this division of work is acceptable.

I've successfully implemented the reverse parameter for the groupby filter. I've made the following changes to src/jinja2/filters.py:
1. Added the reverse parameter (defaulting to False) to both sync_do_groupby and do_groupby functions
2. Updated the sorted() calls in both functions to use the reverse parameter
3. Added documentation for the reverse parameter in the sync_do_groupby docstring (which will be inherited by do_groupby via the async_variant decorator)

All changes have been made to the specified line ranges (1200-1230) and maintain backward compatibility. The implementation is complete and ready for testing.

I've completed implementing the separator parameter for the groupby filter. I've made the following changes to src/jinja2/filters.py:
1. Added the separator parameter to sync_do_groupby and do_groupby functions with default value '.'
2. Updated docstrings to document the separator parameter and provide Django-style lookup examples
3. Added validation for empty separators
4. Modified make_attrgetter to use the separator parameter

I've coordinated with you to ensure no conflicts:
- You handled the reverse parameter changes
- I handled the separator parameter changes
- We maintained the correct parameter order (separator before reverse)

The implementation is complete and ready for testing. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further clarification.
